description:
Trying to start an instance using 2011.1~bzr569-0ubuntu0ppa1~maverick3

Instance fails to start, nova-compute.log says the following command failed to run:
sudo -E radvd -C /var/lib/nova/networks/nova-ra-br100.conf -p /var/lib/nova/networks/nova-ra-br100.pid

radvd is not a dependency of nova, and /usr/bin/radvd is not in nova_sudoers.
title: Ubuntu packaging missing dependency on radvd
